=================================
### Highway Coach with Operators

#### 2022-CF-3726546752

#### Solicitation Number: WS3726546752
#### Publication Date: 22 November 2022
#### Tender Closing Date: 12 December 2022, 2:00pm CDT

#### Overview

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites qualified contractors to submit a bid for the provision of Regional Individual Standing Offer (RISO) services for the transportation of personnel by highway coaches with operators. This RISO is intended to meet the transportation needs of the Department of National Defence (DND) Edmonton Garrison in Edmonton, Alberta.

#### Scope of Work

The contractor will be required to provide all labor, transportation, materials, tools, equipment, and supervision necessary to operate highway coaches with operators for DND exercises in Canada and the United States. The contract period will commence on 1 February 2023 and end on 31 January 2026.

#### Notice of Amendment

Please note that the Amber was amended and the tender closing date has changed to 12 December 2022 at 2:00pm CDT. All bids must be submitted by this time; late bids will be declared non-responsive.

#### Reporting Requirements

The contractor is required to report to the designated pick-up point at the time of the call-up by the Identified User.

#### Technical Requirements

The contractor must have a suitable fleet of highway coaches, including those with a minimum of 40 passenger capacity, equipped with necessary materials, tools, and equipment for safe transportation. The contractor must also have a team of qualified operators with a thorough understanding of operating regulations and protocols.

#### Evaluation Committee

The evaluation committee will assess bids based on the following criteria:

* lowest price
* technical capabilities
* experience and qualifications of the contractor

#### Contact Information

Interested contractors should contact Matthew Havrilenko, PSPC, at matthew.havrilenko@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca for further information.
